job_title: Finance and Administrative Officer in Manila, Manila
pros: AIDS Healthcare Foundation is a BLESSING - both to people working within the Organization and people / organization who needs help / assistance. They reach out and touch people's lives all over the world
cons: To enhance further the practices / processes within the organization (AHF as a whole).

job_title: Monitoring and Evaluation Officer in Manila, Manila
pros:
I believe in the mission, vision and direction of AHF. It is helping PLHIVs and their families globally whether directly or indirectly. 

I am quite new as M&E Officer and I am taking bold steps to take my responsibilities as learning experience. I am grateful for the opportunity to work with AHF. I want to stay as long as AHF needs my services.
cons: Heavy workload that even weekends I need to do my job.
